feature_name: External Activities can be run as offerings

user_story.i_want: run an External Activity that has been assigned to me

whens_list: the external activity "My Activity" is assigned to the class "Class_with_no_assignment"
I am logged in with the username student
I go to my classes page
I follow "Class_with_no_assignment" within left panel for class navigation
I should see an external run link to "mock_html/test-external-activity.html"
